Class BowlController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AbstractController
      • controllers.AbstractBowlController
        • controllers.BowlController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBowlController

    public class BowlController
extends AbstractBowlController
    IController instance to handle user requests regarding a Bowl.
    Author:
    mbsusr01 ninja-superbowl 13.04.2017 mbsusr01

      • registerBowl

        public ninja.Result registerBowl(ninja.session.Session session,
                                 ninja.Context context,
                                 java.lang.Boolean emptyTable,
                                 java.lang.String bowlMaxOrdinal,
                                 java.lang.String geoRegionCode,
                                 java.lang.String timberCode,
                                 java.lang.String statusCode,
                                 java.lang.String timberOriginId,
                                 java.lang.String manufactureId)
        Handles the registration of a new Bowl.

        Note that by default the selected GeoRegion will be Europe with an index value of 7 and the default value of 8 as the GeoRegion identifier of european timber in the Timber table of the data source.

        The selectedStatusId refers to the default Status if the template registerBowl is first called.

        The selectedTimberId refers to the default Timber if the template registerBowl is first called.

        Parameters:
        session - the Ninja Session instance
        context - the Ninja Context instance
        emptyTable - indicates whether the Bowl table has entries
        bowlMaxOrdinal - the current maximum ordinal number of persisted bowl incremented by one (1)
        geoRegionCode - the query parameter for a GeoRegion
        timberCode - the query parameter for a Timber
        statusCode - the query parameter for a Status
        timberOriginId - the query parameter for a TimberOrigin
        manufactureId - the query parameter for a Manufacture
        Returns:
        Result instance

      • registerBowlOld

        public ninja.Result registerBowlOld(ninja.session.Session session,
                                    ninja.Context context,
                                    java.lang.Boolean emptyTable)
        Handles the registration of a new Bowl.

        Note that by default the selected GeoRegion will be Europe with an index value of 7 and the default value of 8 as the GeoRegion identifier of european timber in the Timber table of the data source.

        The selectedStatusId refers to the default Status if the template registerBowl is first called.

        The selectedTimberId refers to the default Timber if the template registerBowl is first called.

        Parameters:
        session - the Ninja Session instance
        context - the Ninja Context instance
        emptyTable - indicates whether the Bowl table has entries
        Returns:
        Result instance
